title: Newtons third law - cart colliding with block

content.question: A cart moving to the right collides with a stationary block, resulting in the two objects sliding together along the horizontal surface until coming to stop. During the collision, the cart exerts a force <math alttext="F sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> on the block, the surface exerts a force of friction <math alttext="F sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> on the block, and the block exerts a force <math alttext="F sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math> on the cart. Which of the following must be true about the magnitudes of these forces during the collision?

choices.label: <math alttext="the absolute value of F sub 1, equals the absolute value of F sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the absolute value of F sub 2, equals the absolute value of F sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the absolute value of F sub 1, equals the absolute value of F sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the absolute value of F sub 1, equals the absolute value of F sub 2, which equals the absolute value of F sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the absolute value of F sub 1, equals the absolute value of F sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>|</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>
